data.title: Twilight helium 10,830-Å calculations and observations
data.meta_description: Calculations have been made of the 10,830-Å column emission rates from metastable He(2³S) atoms in the upper atmosphere, and these have been compared with other calculations and observations. The daw...
data.text:
